item.description:
Hello all,

Since this is so last minute, I am not setting this up quite as formally as we usually would. I loved this restaurant when I ate there with my boyfriend last year. It was one of my finds courtesy of the Entertainment Book. The Tavern received the Gold Plate Award from NECN's TV Diner in 2008!!!

Prices are quite reasonable:

Appetizers and soup range from $2.95 - $8.95
Salads range from $3.25 - $11.95
Sandwiches and burgers are all under $10
and Entrees are all under $20

Live Entertainment in their lounge, Wednesday thru Saturday Nights from 7:00PM (check website for more details)

MJ and I will be hosting the event and hope you would like to join us, too!

Hope to see you there!

Alison

Tavern from Tower Square
(Route 1)
119 Washington Street, Plainville, MA 02762
(508) 699-7600

Here is the link to the menu:
http://www.taverndini...


Cost: Annual members are free, members and guests are $2

Please bring CASH per SSDOMG cash only policy.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DIRECTIONS:

95 to Exit 9 (follow signs for route 1 south)
Located south of Gillette Stadium on Route 1
item.how_to_find_us: Look for MJ and me in the entry way.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Last minute dinner @ Tavern from Tower Square
